author: Melanie Grayce West
title: Schumer unveils measures to rein in gun violence - MarketWatch
text:
Citing the activism of students around the country, New York Sen. Chuck Schumer on Sunday announced legislative measures that he will introduce in the coming weeks in an attempt to curb gun violence and prevent future mass shootings.

The first initiative calls for universal background checks, ensuring that no one with a felony conviction or who has been found to be mentally ill can buy a gun over the internet or at a gun show. Mr. Schumer, a Democrat, said at a news conference that he also would urge Congress to pass a law...
